title: Launcher wont start
body: So when i try to turn on Lol nothing happens and I'm on a mac so can you help me because when i go to Finder then Library to Riot Games I dont get any folders, please help me.

replies.body: Try launching League from your *Applications* folder. This will ensure it's accessing the right files, as we've seen some Mac players have issues launching League from the dock in the past. If you still encounter issues after that, please let me know!
